snippet: Archaeologists, long kept from their work in Syria, now hear reports of fighting and theft at historical sites and museums.
abstract: Report by United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization shows that many archaeological sites around Syria have suffered extreme damage as a result of fighting, rampant pillaging and looting during country's ongoing civil war; say that destruction is so bad country runs risk of obliterating its long cultural history.
lead_paragraph: Archaeologists, long kept from their work in Syria, now hear reports of fighting and theft at historical sites and museums.

headline.main: Among the Wounded in Syria’s War: Ancient History
headline.print_headline: Among the Wounded in Syria’s War: Ancient History
